tool_description: Interprets laboratory test results and identifies abnormal values that contribute to patient risk assessment.

lab_units.description: Array of measurement units for each lab value

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: lab_tests, lab_values, and lab_units arrays must have equal length
Invalid lab test name: One or more lab test names are not recognized
Invalid lab value: Lab values must be numeric and within plausible ranges
Invalid test date: Use ISO 8601 date format, date cannot be in the future
Invalid demographics: Age must be 0-120, gender must be male/female/other
usage: Provide equal-length arrays of lab_tests, lab_values, and lab_units along with test_date and patient demographics. Tool interprets results against reference ranges.

abnormal_results.description: List of lab tests with abnormal values

critical_values.description: List of lab tests with critical/panic values
